sn3.1:2.1: 1. Paṭhamavagga
sn3.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn3.1:4.3: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn3.1:4.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn3.1:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.1:4.7: “bhavampi no gotamo anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti paṭijānātī”ti?
sn3.1:4.8: “Yañhi taṃ, mahārāja, sammā vadamāno vadeyya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti, mameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn3.1:5.1: “Yepi te, bho gotama, samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṅghino gaṇino gaṇācariyā ñātā yasassino titthakarā sādhusammatā bahujanassa, seyyathidaṃ—
sn3.1:5.2: pūraṇo kassapo, makkhali gosālo, nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto, sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto, pakudho kaccāyano, ajito kesakambalo;
sn3.1:5.3: tepi mayā ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti paṭijānāthā’ti puṭṭhā samānā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti na paṭijānanti.
sn3.1:5.4: Kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo daharo ceva jātiyā navo ca pabbajjāyā”ti?
sn3.1:6.1: “Cattāro kho me, mahārāja, daharāti na uññātabbā, daharāti na paribhotabbā.
sn3.1:6.3: Khattiyo kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:6.4: Urago kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:6.5: Aggi kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:6.6: Bhikkhu, kho, mahārāja, daharoti na uññātabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo.
sn3.1:6.7: Ime kho, mahārāja, cattāro daharāti na uññātabbā, daharāti na paribhotabbā”ti.
sn3.1:7.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
sn3.1:11.2: urago carati tejasī;
sn3.1:13.3: So āsajja ḍahe bālaṃ,
sn3.1:17.1: Evaṃ vutte, rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.1:17.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn3.1:17.6: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
sn3.1:17.7: Upāsakaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
